name: Drama Beasts of TOMORROW
description:
In the tomorrow times, a dramatic performance will come to pass which will unite all beings in peaceful harmony.

For the STL Scatterjam, we blazed some serious tale and made this awesome game!

Download the TaleBlazer app for iOS or Android and enter the code: gfusyhh

Note: This game is intended to be played while visiting the St. Louis Zoo!

TaleBlazer Game Page: http://taleblazer.org/game/gamePage/4027
